website_summaries.verdict: Be it on the road or the comforts of your home, the Select Road v5 is equipped with technologies that make rides fun and comfortable. The upper has vents to keep the foot cool. The straps on the midfoot make it easy to operate, so you’re always ready to move.Meanwhile, the outsole is engineered to be stiff, which is beneficial for quick accelerations. This pair of Pearl Izumis also receives praise for its style and durability.
pros: A majority of cyclists say the Pearl Izumi Select Road v5 is comfortable to use right out of the box
A bunch of users like that this cycling shoe is quick to slip on and off
Many owners believe that this product is made using quality materials
The footgear can be used for both indoor and outdoor cycling, which pleased a lot of individuals
This merchandise is considered stylish by multiple consumers
cons: The outsole is not as stiff as a few people expected from a road cycling trainer
One person notes that a seam near the toes rubs the skin raw

customer_reviews.title: Made for big feet
customer_reviews.text: I wear 13 wide, and cannot find bike shoes in my size, (maybe they are trying to tell me something). Anyway these fit just fine for my size. I did discover my incorrect bike fitting was causing my foot numbness, not my old bike shoes. So I will keep the Pearl iZUMIi's anyway, because, I CAN'T FIND SHOES FOR BIG FEET....ha ha lol!
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle57

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my feet, maybe yours
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow proportional to length. I know Pearl Izumi runs smaller than most but I've owned PI shoes before so I was familiar. My feet were numb within 10 minutes of starting the ride and no amount of strap adjustment could remedy this. The sole is also not very stiff as I had a decent pressure point in the middle of where I contact the pedal. I gave 3 stars because I feel like they might fit different people's feet better than mine giving them the benefit of the doubt and they also look really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli A Glover

customer_reviews.title: Order Up 1/2 Size
customer_reviews.text: This product fits great and is an excellent price. Only suggestion after research and visiting the cycling store is order up a 1/2 size. My Husband loves the shoe and it’s very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: KaliGirl37

customer_reviews.title: Loving these
customer_reviews.text: So I think they could be lighter, but they are sturdy, comfortably, and very easy to slip on and off. My Look cleats went on perfectly, as I'm sure any would. I've been using them for over a month now and have not had any problems. They fit exactly as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Apollinaire

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cycling shoe
customer_reviews.text: They can be changed from the delta cleats( that are commonly used with peloton) to the spd cleat...they are well made I. Found them true to size overall great shoe :just FYI you have to buy cleats in addition
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. I've had a few chances to use them. They feel really good on my feet and a decent price. They appear to be very good quality. I keep these kind of things for a long time. We will see hold they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are pretty good. I had a pair of specialized that ran a tad small. These fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Solid Choice.
customer_reviews.text: Velcro allows for snug fit. SPD cleat really sticks out. Easy to clip in, very hard to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G.

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable breathable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2 sizes larger based on reviews and it was too big so I returned them and ordered 1 size larger. Fits perfect and is such a great shoe so far. Difficult to find cycling shoes in a larger size and so happy I found these. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Taormina

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes, not for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of cycling shoes. Velcro only, so lacking the added value of a ratchet. Look great, but not for someone with narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: mike gormley

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and comfortable on longer rides
customer_reviews.text: I like the velcro straps over the cam locks. Fit my ultegra clipless pedals and have been comfortable out to 65-100 mile rides so far. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cycling shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Bought these because they're the same ones that they rent you at Soul Cycle. They're super comfy, lightweight, supportive... Everything you could ask for. I wish my regular shoes fit this well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good fitting shoe, slightly, very slightly larger than typical fit for me but I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Tackel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 49 and they were a perfect fit. The toe shoe box is not tight and the width is spot on. They are light on the petals. I have about 500 miles on them and I am very pleased and would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: chuck moore

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: these fit great and are a great addition to my kit.
customer_reviews.author: Julie + Sean

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit, sent them back
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the fact that they did not fit, I was not impressed with the appearance. They did not have the apparent quality that I expected from Pearl iZUMi.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and fits snugly just the way want them to. Cleats were easy to install, too.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Durable, easy to clean, no residing odor or anything if maintained well. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good cycling shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and are very good quality. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BigMike

customer_reviews.title: Used for Spin
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these shoes feel. The color is simple but the white is a nice touch when the black lights are on.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect design and pretty colors combination. very comfortable and very light; fitted as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Xavy Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Near the toes after the third strap is a sewn ...
customer_reviews.text: Near the toes after the third strap is a sewn piece that rubs against the tops of my toes when I'm riding. It has broken the skin on each of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Very cool, sleek shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, sleek shoes. The shoe itself could be a bit tighter. Not for the show boater. Awesome price for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek & Comfortable! What I like: •Fits as expected •Comfortable •Sleek and cool looking What I don't like: •N/A
customer_reviews.author: AdminX

product_meta.title: PEARL IZUMI Men's Select Road V5 Cycling Shoe
product_meta.description: The SELECT Road v5 shoe challenges the thinking that beauty comes at a high price. Inspired by the design of the top-of-the-line P.R.O. Leader v4, we re-engineered the upper to deliver a fully bonded construction for instant comfort. The improved nylon plate increases stiffness for quick acceleration and all day foot support for long days in the saddle.
feature_bullets: Advanced 3-Layer Seamless Composite Upper offers exceptional breathability and eliminates hot spots by adapting to your unique foot shape
1:1 Anatomic 3-Strap Closure removes pressure from your instep to eliminate hot spots
SELECT 1:1 Composite Power Plate with nylon forefoot insert provides improved lightweight stiffness and durability (stiffness rating 6)
EVA foam and rubber heel bumper gives stability and walking comfort
